description:
Moria`s mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy`s shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji`s eyes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le rugissement d’Oz ! Montrez-vous, pirates au chapeau de paille !
Oars Roars! Come Out, Straw Hat Crew!
Oz Hoeru!! Detekoi Mugiwara no Ichimi
Рёв Оза!! Выходи, команда Соломенной шляпы
オーズ吼える!! 出て来い麦わらの一味
